name: Yae Miko
source: Reward for inviting Yae Miko to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If your side of the field has a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114081]</color>, destroy it and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114083]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. If your side of the field has a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sesshou Sakura</color>, destroy it and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tenko Thunderbolts</color>.
skills.description: Deals 4 Electro DMG. If your side of the field has a Sesshou Sakura, destroy it and create Tenko Thunderbolts.
